catalog_info.title: Tumor Pathophysiology and Transport Phenomena - A Systems Biology Approach
catalog_info.notes: Given in alternate years. Offered jointly with the Medical School as PA 712.0. Classes held at MIT.
catalog_info.description: Tumor pathophysiology plays a central role in the growth, metastasis, detection, and treatment of solid tumors. Principles of transport phenomena are applied to develop a quantitative understanding of tumor biology and treatment.
